log_file.help: Save all log data to a file (blank means 'log_[date].txt' with date format yymmddhhmmss in 'log' folder of AlphaTims directory).

bruker_d_folder.help: A Bruker .d folder with raw data.

output_folder.help: A directory for all output (blank means `bruker_d_folder` root is used).

threads.help: The number of threads to use (0 means all, negative means how many threads to leave available).

parameter_file.help: A .json file with (non-required) parameters (blank means default parameters are used). This overrides all default and CLI parameters.

compress.help: Compression of hdf files. If set, this roughly halves files sizes (on-disk), at the cost of taking 3-6 longer accession times.
